snippet: In Portland, Ore., the restaurant Nostrana hosts its fourth annual Negroni Social, complete with 12 recipes concocted by leading lady chefs like Nancy Silverton, recent winner of the most prestigious James Beard award.
abstract: In Portland, Ore., the restaurant Nostrana hosts its fourth annual Negroni Social, complete with 12 recipes concocted by leading lady chefs like Nancy Silverton, recent winner of the most prestigious James Beard award.

headline.main: Cocktail Culture | One Negroni for Every Month of the Year
